footer.question: Have questions?

homePage.playWheelPara: , A fun filled place for everyone to enjoy
homePage.playWheelParaSec: Every visit is unique, and people of all ages are welcome. We promise it's a comfortable atmosphere for good wholesome fun. There is really no right or wrong, only infinite possibilities and adventures!

homesecondFragment.heading: Check out Open Play
homesecondFragment.para: Bring your kids to our Open Play for a safe and fun experience filled with a variety of activities and games. Our Open Play includes climbing structures, slides, interactive stations, and craft tables to entertain children of all ages. Our friendly and experienced staff is always present to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience.

bookingForEventsFragment.heading: Booking For Events
bookingForEventsFragment.para: Book a variety of exciting events for kids on our website, including birthday parties and educational workshops. With something for every child's interests and age group, our booking process is quick and easy. Give your child an experience they'll never forget by booking an event today.
